page.title: 14Education around us.
page.content: We go to school every day apart from Saturday and Sunday. You leave school when you're 16 or 18. We go home at 3.30p.m. and have lunch at school costing Â£3.15 per week. St.Catherine's School, our school, was originally built as a Secondary School before becoming a First and Middle School in 1966. On another site in the village was Blechingley Free School founded by John Whatman. Streete Court School near Godstone was called Rooks Nest. Now a public school; but from 1534 until 1964, it has been lived in by many families including the Boones and Turners. It is situated in 140 acres.
